subject: Economy
question_en: What is Gross Domestic Product (GDP) at current market prices in India?
question_hi: भारत में वर्तमान मात्रा व्यापी आय की गण्याचार (GDP)?
explanation_en: As per the latest data available, the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) at current market prices in India is approximately Rs. 30,00,000 crore. The GDP represents the total value of goods and services produced within a country's geographical boundaries in a specific time period (usually a year).
